Whenever you obscure for the first time each turn, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature you don't control. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
Exile five cards from your graveyard: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
